org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtRequests

Class RequestMtImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtRequests.RequestMtImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    RESPONSE_TYPE -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.impl.RequestImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>, org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.Operation<RESPONSE_TYPE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncRequestMtImpl, SyncRequestMtImpl

    public abstract class RequestMtImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.impl.RequestImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>, org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.Operation<RESPONSE_TYPE>
    Base class for internal reactor implementations.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean canceled
      True when this request impl has been canceled.

      True when this reactor impl is closed.

      The request targeted to the source reactor which, when processed, resulted in this message.

      The reactor where this Request Object is passed for processing.
      protected ReactorMtImpl targetReactorImpl
      The reactor impl where this Request Object is passed for processing.
      protected boolean used
      A request can only be used once.

        public RequestSource getRequestSource()

      • use

        protected void use()
        Marks the request as having been used, or throws an exception if the request was already used.

      • signal

        public void signal()
        Passes this Request to the target Reactor without any result being passed back. I.E. The signal method results in a 1-way message being passed. If an exception is thrown while processing this Request, that exception is simply logged as a warning.
        Specified by:
        signal in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.impl.RequestImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>
        Specified by:
        signal in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.Operation<RESPONSE_TYPE>

      • doSend

        public void doSend(org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.impl.ReactorImpl _source,
          org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.AsyncResponseProcessor<RESPONSE_TYPE> _responseProcessor)
        Passes this RequestImpl together with the AsyncResponseProcessor to the target Reactor. Responses are passed back via the source reactor and processed by the provided AsyncResponseProcessor. Any exceptions raised while processing the request are processed by the exception handler active when the doSend method was called.
        Specified by:
        doSend in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.impl.RequestImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>
        Parameters:
        _source - The source reactor impl on whose thread this method was invoked and which will buffer this Request and subsequently receive the result for processing on the same thread.
        _responseProcessor - Passed with this request and then returned with the result, the AsyncResponseProcessor is used to process the result on the same thread that originally invoked this method. If null, then no response is returned.

      • call

        public RESPONSE_TYPE call()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Passes this Request to the target Reactor and blocks the current thread until a result is returned. The call method sends the message directly without buffering, as there is no source reactor. The response message is buffered, though thread migration is not possible.
        Specified by:
        call in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.impl.RequestImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>
        Specified by:
        call in interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.Operation<RESPONSE_TYPE>
        Returns:
        The response value from applying this Request to the target reactor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the result is an exception, it is thrown rather than being returned.

      • setResponse

        protected void setResponse(java.lang.Object _response,
               ReactorMtImpl _activeReactor)
        Assigns a response value.
        Parameters:
        _response - The response value.
        _activeReactor - The responding reactor.

      • processObjectResponse

        protected boolean processObjectResponse(java.lang.Object _response)
        The processObjectResponse method accepts the response value of a request.

        This method need not be thread-safe, as it is always invoked from the same light-weight thread (target reactor) that received the Request.

        Parameters:
        _response - The response to a request.
        Returns:
        True when this is the first response.

        Description copied from interface: org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.Operation
        Returns the Timer used to track the performance of this Request instance. Null is not allowed are return value, but Timer.NOP can be used to disable tracking.
